title: Lilith
description: 4004 BC: In this retelling of the Adam & Eve story, a hermitâ€™s life is turned upside-down by the arrival of a mysterious woman in his camp. As the story of their portentous meeting carries forward through the millennia, only time will tell if Lilith is a heroine, a victim, or a monster.  A short story from The Prometheus Saga.
author: Antonio Simon Jr.
